mod_sslÂ¶

Setting up mod_ssl.

Component Tested version(s)
apache2.2-common 2.2.14-5ubuntu8.4

The mod_ssl module is included in the apache2-common package.

Install the apache2-common package:

$ sudo apt-get install apache2.2-common

Enable the module:

$ sudo a2enmod ssl
